name: Representational State Transfer
description: Architectural style for designing networked applications using standard HTTP methods

name: JavaScript Object Notation
description: Lightweight data interchange format that is easy for humans to read and write

name: Extensible Markup Language
description: Markup language that defines rules for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable

name: Open Authorization
description: Open standard for access delegation, commonly used for token-based authentication

name: OpenAPI Specification
description: Specification for machine-readable interface files for describing, producing, consuming, and visualizing RESTful web services
